text:
🌊A short stretch of beach.
No activities or amenities.
No washroom and no food.
Not suitable for swimming.
🌊But, it's scenic and serene.
🌊Sit around, observe the picturesque sea views, enjoy the sea breeze and listen to the sound of the sea waves.
That is therapeutic.

Around 11.2 km bike ride from Area B bike shop car park on ECP. Perfect place to take a pit stop when you are on way to jewel or to changi beach park. If you are in luck, you can folks doing wind surfing. Pleasant view and too little crowd !
It is just ok for sitting on the sea shore, listening to the sea waves.
Wow very beautiful place,and like nature.

too dark and unlit at night on certain portions of this area. but a silent beach with a lot of green around. quite a gem of east coast park actually, too bad its quite out of the way. the end of this path at its opening to tmcr can be improved.
